In the World

this is a list of things i do out in the wide wild world. it’s kind of like a CV but less uptight.

Upcoming

  • Life Radio - Season 3! Estimated release date: TBD

2024

  • Liberation Tarot Deck

2023

  • Podcast: We are What we Practice (Dec 2023 - Feb 2024)
  • Liberation Tarot Kickstarter (Kickstarter live 17 July - 18 Aug 2023)
    • Buy the deck here
  • Boston Ujima Project Newsletter — #Men’sWork Edition (20 April 2023)

2022

  • ManKind Project USA: Lawrence Barriner II: Creating a Post-Patriarchy Future (5 Oct)
  • The Wonder Dome: #106 Facing the Violence Within (with Lawrence Barriner and Yotam Schachter) (23 Aug)
  • A Taste of the Benefit Concert for Better Selves Fellowships 2022 (Aug)
  • Zine: all that we touch we change – reflections on transformative networks
  • Networks That Build Black Futures (18 Feb)
  • Podcast: Enough is Enough (6 episodes) (20 Jan)

2021

  • The Wonder Dome: #75 Making New Worlds Possible (with Lawrence Barriner II) (19 Oct)
  • 6-week POC Meditation & Storytelling series (May 6 - June 10)

2020

  • Webinar hosted by Harvard Divinity School + Sacred Design Lab: “Commitment in community: what does Bonhoeffer’s monasticism have to say to us today?” (9 Dec 2020)
  • Webinar hosted by United for a Fair Economy: Personal and Collective Healing for Liberation (8 Oct 2020)
  • Webinar hosted by CoCreative: Narrative - Personal, Political, Planetary (24 Sept 2020)
  • Call Your Girlfriend: Power of Community: Summer of Friendship #8 (mentioned on podcast) (21 Aug 2020)
  • Hey Mom: Resources and strategies for recruiting white family as allies for Black liberation (5 June 2020)
  • The Wilds Beyond Climate Justice: 2-part workshop - Unleashing Alternative Futures (June 3 & 4 2020)
  • How We Show Up: Reclaiming Family, Friendship, and Community by Mia Birdsong (friendship permaculture is included in the book) (2 Jun 2020)
  • The Full Set w Lawrence Barriner, II (15 May 2020)
  • Pax Christi: Reflection for Holy Thursday, April 9 (9 April 2020)
  • Pleasure Activism & Story-based Strategy: A Conversation with Jess St. Louis & Lawrence Barriner (14 Feb 2020)
  • Gibrán Rivera’s Show: Men Need to be Held (23 Jan 2020)
